subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Carlos Pena hit a grand slam against C. C. Sabathia in the first inning, and his game-ending hit against Mariano Rivera in the ninth led the Rays past the Yankees.
snippet: Carlos Pena hit a grand slam against C. C. Sabathia in the first inning, and his game-ending hit against Mariano Rivera in the ninth led the Rays past the Yankees.
